mng: and, moreover, yet, for the time being, to be about to, both (... and...)

exm.mng: (not only ...) but also, moreover, in addition, furthermore
and, besides, moreover, furthermore, in addition
for now, for the time being, temporarily
perfunctory, careless, drifting along, resigned to one's fate, improper (relations), illicit (sex)
satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through, without high ambitions, but getting by
to wait a moment, do not go too soon
